name: OctoInstaller
description: This task is deprecated, please use latest version instead. Install a specific version of the Octopus CLI
helpMarkDown: Install a specific version of the Octopus CLI
author: Octopus Deploy

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Octopus CLI Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify `latest` or the version number to download. If you specify `embedded`, or the download fails, a built-in copy of the tool will be used.
